text:
The protesters began to come to the squares under the slogan "One of the Unit".
03 Nov 2019, 15:31 by Lebanon 24
Protesters in various Lebanese areas began to come to the squares and streets to participate in demonstrations "One of Unity", in Beirut, Sidon, Tripoli and Tire and in Kfarman - Nabatieh, where the Lebanese flocked to the square of science in the city, demanding to "hold the corrupt and return the looted money to the state", signed National anthems, holding Lebanese flags, amid tight security measures taken by the army and security forces around the flag square.
